titleStmt.title: Severall considerations offered to the Parliament concerning the improvement of trade, navigation and comerce more especially the old draperies and other woolen manufactures of England / by G.C., a louer of his country.
titleStmt.author: Carew, George, Esq.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to George Carew.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
